scripts.codegen: yarn run codegen:schema && yarn run codegen:graph
scripts.prepare-codegen: func() { node ./combine-abis.js && yarn run --silent mustache "../../config/$1.json" subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn run codegen; }; func
scripts.deploy:ropsten: yarn graph deploy mStable/mStable-feeders-ropsten --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
scripts.deploy:staging: yarn graph deploy mStable/mStable-feeders-staging --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn graph deploy mStable/mStable-feeders --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
